data.actual_result: The user sounds as 100%, but in the UI it is registered as 10%
data.expected_result: The user should sound as on Step 2
data.short_description: The volume of a user is not applied correctly when re-joining a voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel with another user in it - Set the user volume to 10% (Just for demostration purposes) - Leave the voice channel - Join again the voice channel
